summary: When a businessman learns that his wife married him only for money, he hatches a plan with her ex-lover to kill her.
cast: Bobby Deol|Akshaye Khanna|Ameesha Patel|Johnny Lever|Naushaad Abbas|Master Aman|Raj Anand|Bhairavi|Baby Cherry|Donny|Farhan|Dinesh Hingoo|Firoz Irani|Dilip Joshi|Kurnail Kapoor|Shabnam Kapoor|Sudhir Mittu|Suhasini Mulay|Ishwar Patel|Prithvi|Meenu Rao|Sheela Sharma|Sudhir|Roshan Tirandaz|Jeetu Verma
director: Directors: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla (as Abbas), Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla (as Mustan)
title: Humraaz
